title: Odd Melody
description: Janie Smith is ready to get her life in order.She just needs to control her powers, feed without killing someone, deal with a sick witch sneezing spells, a vampire boyfriend committed by fate to another, and an ancient serial killer’s ghost hidden inside an unsuspecting human. Oh, and she must also put up with Queen Mab’s unwanted elfin fiancé while dodging Chance, her supposed soul mate, while helping her daughter adjust to life after divorce. Seriously, not a big deal.
author: Virginia Nelson
